Sentencas: A core-shell structured nickel/yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni/YSZ) powder was synthesized by the hydrazine method from an aqueous nickel chloride solution (NiCl2 center dot 6H(2)O) with YSZ particles, which were prepared by a hydrothermal technique.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of solid oxide fuel cell anodes from core-shell structured Ni/yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) powders

Sentencas: The cationic surfactant cetyltrimethyl ammonium bromide (CTAB) was added to form the core-shell structure.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of solid oxide fuel cell anodes from core-shell structured Ni/yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) powders

Sentencas: Nano-sized YSZ shell particles were homogeneously coated onto the surface of the spherical Ni core particles.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of solid oxide fuel cell anodes from core-shell structured Ni/yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) powders

Sentencas: It was found that the addition of CTAB was crucial for the formation of the core-shell structured Ni/YSZ powder.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of solid oxide fuel cell anodes from core-shell structured Ni/yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) powders

Sentencas: The size of the YSZ shell particles affected the morphology of the Ni/YSZ core-shell powder.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of solid oxide fuel cell anodes from core-shell structured Ni/yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) powders

Sentencas: Finer YSZ shell particles led to a denser coverage of the Ni core particle.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of solid oxide fuel cell anodes from core-shell structured Ni/yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) powders

Sentencas: During the heat treatment of the Ni/YSZ core-shell powder in air, the Ni was partly oxidized to NiO, and a three-dimensional network structure of NiO and YSZ was obtained.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of solid oxide fuel cell anodes from core-shell structured Ni/yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) powders

Sentencas: The enhanced electrical conductivity in the Ni/YSZ anode because of the core-shell structured powder was considered to be due to the improved connectivity between the Ni and YSZ particles.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of solid oxide fuel cell anodes from core-shell structured Ni/yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) powders

Sentencas: The maximum power densities and the polarization resistances of the Ni/YSZ anode from the core-shell structured powder were 0.38, 0.57, and 0.84 W/cm(2) and 1.01, 0.52, and 0.25 Omega cm(2) at 700, 750, and 800 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of solid oxide fuel cell anodes from core-shell structured Ni/yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) powders

Sentencas: (C) 2016 Elsevier Ltd and Techna Group S.r.l.
